author: jmejiagu
body:
#### Move patZpeak.py code to python3

It was necessary because of the FWLite.Python section of the CMSWorbook (3.5.4) has been updated.
https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/WorkBookFWLitePython

It has been tested in this repository:
https://github.com/jmejiagu/MyFWLite_12
where you can see instructions for running the "new" patZpeak code.
title: New pat zpeak py3
